news.title: Target shares tumble 10% as retailer picks new CEO, says sales fell again
news.summary: Investors are looking for signs that the struggling big-box retailer Target is getting back on track. Target is one of the largest retailers in the U.S.

news.title: Hassett likely to be Trump's pick for Fed chief, though Warsh is more qualified, CNBC survey finds
news.summary: The NEC director firmly led when asked who the president will choose from among 11 names being considered. The president is expected to make a decision by the end of the month.

news.title: Trump slams 'anti-American' pushback after fresh delay to Arizona copper mine
news.summary: Rio Tinto and BHP have been trying to develop Resolution Copper for roughly two decades. Two of the world's largest mining firms have been working on the project for years.

news.title: Trump snapped up more than $100 million in bonds while in office
news.summary: The U.S. president has purchased hundreds of bonds issued by companies, local governments and school boards. The bonds were issued by the companies and local governments.

news.title: Claire's sells most of its North American business after filing for bankruptcy
news.summary: Claire's announced Wednesday that it is selling most of its North American business. The move is an effort to stave off liquidation after filing for bankruptcy.

news.title: Home Depot put up some of its best numbers in years. Did tariff-related price increases move the needle?
news.summary: One analyst says a pullback in promotional deals raised prices, possibly due to “a desire to protect margins in a tariffed environment”

news.title: Meredith Whitney famously called the 2008 financial crisis. Here’s the new problem with the U.S. economy, she says
news.summary: Meredith Whitney is worried about a bifurcated economy. Here is how she’s playing that. Meredith Whitney: I’m worried about an economy that doesn’t work.

news.title: TJ Maxx parent’s stock jumps toward a record as consumers flock to its off-price goods
news.summary: TJ Maxx parent’s stock rallies toward a record after an earnings beat and raised outlook. The company also raised its outlook for the year.

news.title: My friend’s father gifted her Tesla and Google stock. They could be worth millions. Will they be split 50/50 in her divorce?
news.summary: “My friend is working on an exit plan,” he says. “My friends are working on a plan.”

news.title: Estée Lauder to cut up to 7,000 jobs as China and duty-free sales stay weak
news.summary: Estée Lauder's stock drops after announcement of jobs cuts and a profit warning. Estée Lauder’s stock drops following announcement of. jobs cuts, profit warning and a stock drop.
